doctor.name: Dr. A.K.M Khairul Basher
doctor.info: Dr. A.K.M Khairul Basher is a highly skilled pediatric urologist and pediatric surgeon specializing in the treatment of congenital and acquired urological disorders in children. With an MBBS, BCS (Health), and MS in Pediatric Surgery from BSMMU, he has extensive experience in managing complex surgical cases in infants and children. As an Assistant Professor of Pediatric Urology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, he is dedicated to providing advanced surgical care. Dr. Basher specializes in treating conditions such as hypospadias, undescended testes, vesicoureteral reflux, hydronephrosis, pediatric hernias, and congenital urinary tract abnormalities. He consults at Comfort Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, offering expert care for young patients. Book an appointment today for specialized pediatric surgical and urological treatment.

doctor.name: Dr. Zannatul Ferdous Peu
doctor.info: Dr. Zannatul Ferdous Peu is a compassionate pediatric surgery specialist in Dhaka with qualifications including MBBS from Dhaka Medical College (DMC), MRCS (UK), and MS in Pediatric Surgery. She specializes in diagnosing and treating a variety of surgical conditions in children, including congenital anomalies, pediatric hernias, undescended testis, hydrocele, anorectal malformations, and other gastrointestinal and urological disorders in children. Dr. Peu serves as a Medical Officer in Pediatric Surgery at Bangladesh Medical University (BMU). She provides consultations at SIBL Foundation Hospital & Diagnostic Center, located at Fattah Plaza, 70, Green Road, Panthapath, Dhaka – 1205, from 3pm to 5pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Samidur Rahman
doctor.specialty: Pediatric Surgeon, Specialty in Hypospadias Surgery
doctor.info: Professor Dr. Samidur Rahman is an established and highly skilled pediatric surgeon with over 22 years’ experience in the field of Pediatric Surgery. Due to his keen and enthusiastic interest on Hypospadias surgery and consistent devoted work on this fine but difficult topic by this time he is well known Hypospadias surgeon in surgical society as well as all over the country. Hypospadias, a penile birth defect of the urinary opening, affects approximately 1 in 200 newborns. Surgery is usually recommended to restore normal appearance and function. The most common operation performed world-wide is the TIP repair, also known as the Snodgrass procedure and Other common procedures like Mathieu with or without Hadidi modification, Snod-Bush (STAG I &II), Johansons, Double Y meatoplasty, Bracka stage procedure are being practiced by Professor Dr. Samidur Rahman on regular basis according to the justified evaluation of the patients. He has performed more than 2,500 hypospadias operations and reoperations in cluding correction of complications. His published results are acceptable and comparable with those of other center in the world.

chamber.address: Cha, 80/3, Shadhinota Soroni (Progoti Soroni), Uttar Badda, Dhaka
